mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date FROM stock GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') DESC LIMIT 7

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%H:%i') AS hour, turn_over AS turnOver FROM stock GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(date, '%H:%i') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') DESC where DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 5 DAY)
